# ImageSet

| Property | Type | Required | Description | Version |
| -------- | ---- | -------- | ----------- | ------- |
| **type** | `"ImageSet"` |  No | Must be `ImageSet` | 1.0 |
| **images** | `Image[]` | Yes | The array of `Image` elements to show. | 1.0 |
| **imageSize** | `any` |  No | Controls the approximate size of the image. The physical dimensions will vary per host. Specify `"auto"` for true image dimension, or `"stretch"` to force it to fill the container. | 1.0 |
| **id** | `any` |  No | &nbsp; | 1.0 |
| **spacing** | `any` |  No | &nbsp; | 1.0 |
| **separator** | `any` |  No | &nbsp; | 1.0 |
